explanation: The majority of live chat opinions and crowd sentiment are bullish on BTC, with several users calling for new all-time highs (ATH), upward price targets (108k-110k+), and numerous mentions of entering or holding long positions. There is frequent excitement over recent breakouts, and some participants are asking about re-entry points or additional buys. While a minority express concerns about potential corrections or short-term pullbacks, the net positive sentiment is reinforced by many users reporting profits, discussing targets above current levels, and referencing technical analysis (e.g., cup and handle, support on 50 EMA, breakout confirmation). There are also references to institutional buying (e.g., MicroStrategy, Metaplanet) and anticipation around ETF and macro news, further adding to the bullish outlook.
